text: Gabriel Tambon (23 March 1930 - 27 December 2015) was a French politician for the Union for a Popular Movement (UMP). He served as the Mayor of Le Castellet, Var from 1965 until his death. He was born in Castellet, Vaucluse. Tambon died on 27 December 2015 at the age of 85. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2015 deaths Category:French mayors Category:Politicians from Provence-Alpes-Cote d'Azur Category:People from Vaucluse Category:People from Var
title: Gabriel Tambon
